mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMP (EMPNO, ENAME, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, SAL, COMM, DEPTNO) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{name}, #{job}, #{mgrNo}, #{hireDate}, #{salary}, #{commission}, #{department.deptNo})
UPDATE EMP SET ENAME = #{name}, JOB = #{job}, MGR = #{mgrNo}, HIREDATE = #{hireDate}, SAL = #{salary}, COMM = #{commission}, DEPTNO = #{department.deptNo} WHERE EMPNO = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPNO, E.ENAME, E.JOB, E.MGR, E.HIREDATE, E.SAL, E.COMM, D.DEPTNO, D.DNAME, D.LOC FROM EMP E LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO
